About me

Hi, my name is Dan and I am Front End / Web Developer with a passion for technology, based in Basingstoke, UK. I have been working in the tech industry for 2 years which has allowed me to gain lots of technical skills and knowledge while also allowing me to work on my creative side.

Outside of work I am a keen tennis player and take part in a local club weekly which helps me to socialise, exercise and enjoy myself at the same time.

Here are a few technologies I am familiar with:

  • JavaScript
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • ReactJS
  • JQuery
  • Bootstrap

RELEVANT EXPERIENCE

  • May 2021

    ITSM Consultant

    In this role i was responsible for working closely with clients and partners to design, build and the transition service management products.

  • July 2020

    Junior Software Engineer

    My role was to help develop and test a powerful closed loop, round trip notification system. Helping implement new designs, technology and efficiency of the product.

  • Sep 2018

    Apple Specialist

    As a specialist, my role was to uncover customers needs, then follow through with enlightening solutions. Helping guide, advise and even setting up their new products.

FEATURED PROJECTS

PETALS - FLOWER SHOP

Eccomerce

Petals is a fictional flower shop, allowing users to discovery and find a variety of beautiful flowers. The website includes information gathered from a custom API, which users can filter and add to cart.

  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • ReactJS

CRYPTONICS

Price Tracker

Cryptonics is a crytpo currency website that allows users to track and keep up to date with all the latest prices. The website includes charts and tables to help navigate and display data in a stylistic way.

  • ReactJS
  • MaterialUI
  • Axios
  • ChartJS

YAMAZAKI - SUSHI BAR

Restaurant

Yamazaki is a static website based off a local restaurant, allowing users to order food online via links to Uber Eats, JUST EAT and contacting the restaurant directly. Users can also view upcoming events and search through the menus.

  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript

MR CHONGO

NFT

Mr Chongo is a static website that allows users to discover more about the “Mr Chongo” NFT. This bright colourful website provides useful links, roadmaps and contact forms.

  • HTML
  • Bootstrap
  • JQuery
